title: dsc_pileup
description:
Dsc-pileup is a software tool to pileup reads and corresponding base quality 
for each overlapping SNPs and each barcode. By using pileup files,
it would allow us to run demuxlet/freemuxlet pretty fast multiple times
without going over the BAM file again.

Dataset input.title: Dataset input
Dataset input.description: Dataset input using nf-tower "dataset" or "data explorer". Allows for the input of multiple         parameter sets to initialise a Nextflow channel.

param_list.description: Dataset input can either be a list of maps, a csv file, a json file, a yaml file, or simply a yaml                 blob. The names of the input fields (e.g. csv columns, json keys) need to be an exact match with the workflow input parameters.

sam.help_text: Type: `file`. Input SAM/BAM/CRAM file. Must be sorted by coordinates and indexed.

tag_group.description: Type: `string`, default: `CB`. Tag representing readgroup or cell barcodes, in the case to partition the BAM file into multiple groups
tag_group.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `CB`. Tag representing readgroup or cell barcodes, in the case to partition the BAM file into multiple groups. For 10x genomics, use CB.

tag_umi.help_text: Type: `string`, default: `UB`. Tag representing UMIs. For 10x genomiucs, use UB.

exclude_flag.description: Type: `integer`, default: `1796`. SAM/BAM FLAGs to be excluded
exclude_flag.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `1796`. SAM/BAM FLAGs to be excluded.

vcf.description: Type: `file`. Input VCF/BCF file for dsc-pileup, containing the AC and AN field
vcf.help_text: Type: `file`. Input VCF/BCF file for dsc-pileup, containing the AC and AN field.

sm.description: Type: `string`. List of sample IDs to compare to (default: use all)
sm.help_text: Type: `string`. List of sample IDs to compare to (default: use all).

sm_list.description: Type: `string`. File containing the list of sample IDs to compare
sm_list.help_text: Type: `string`. File containing the list of sample IDs to compare.

sam_verbose.description: Type: `integer`, default: `1000000`. Verbose message frequency for SAM/BAM/CRAM
sam_verbose.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `1000000`. Verbose message frequency for SAM/BAM/CRAM.

vcf_verbose.description: Type: `integer`, default: `1000`. Verbose message frequency for VCF/BCF
vcf_verbose.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `1000`. Verbose message frequency for VCF/BCF.

skip_umi.help_text: Type: `boolean_true`, default: `false`. Do not generate [prefix].umi.gz file, which stores the regions covered by each barcode/UMI pair.

cap_bq.description: Type: `integer`, default: `40`. Maximum base quality (higher BQ will be capped)
cap_bq.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `40`. Maximum base quality (higher BQ will be capped).

min_bq.description: Type: `integer`, default: `13`. Minimum base quality to consider (lower BQ will be skipped)
min_bq.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `13`. Minimum base quality to consider (lower BQ will be skipped).

min_mq.description: Type: `integer`, default: `20`. Minimum mapping quality to consider (lower MQ will be ignored)
min_mq.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `20`. Minimum mapping quality to consider (lower MQ will be ignored).

min_td.description: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum distance to the tail (lower will be ignored)
min_td.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum distance to the tail (lower will be ignored).

excl_flag.description: Type: `integer`, default: `3844`. SAM/BAM FLAGs to be excluded for SNP overlapping Read filtering Options
excl_flag.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `3844`. SAM/BAM FLAGs to be excluded for SNP overlapping Read filtering Options.

group_list.description: Type: `string`. List of tag readgroup/cell barcode to consider in this run
group_list.help_text: Type: `string`. List of tag readgroup/cell barcode to consider in this run. All other barcodes will be ignored. This is useful for parallelized run.

min_total.description: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum number of total reads for a droplet/cell to be considered
min_total.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum number of total reads for a droplet/cell to be considered.

min_uniq.description: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum number of unique reads (determined by UMI/SNP pair) for a droplet/cell to be considered
min_uniq.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum number of unique reads (determined by UMI/SNP pair) for a droplet/cell to be considered.

min_snp.description: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum number of SNPs with coverage for a droplet/cell to be considered
min_snp.help_text: Type: `integer`, default: `0`. Minimum number of SNPs with coverage for a droplet/cell to be considered.

out.description: Type: `string`, example: `demuxlet_dsc`. dsc-pileup output file prefix
out.help_text: Type: `string`, example: `demuxlet_dsc`. dsc-pileup output file prefix

nextflow input-output arguments.description: Input/output parameters for Nextflow itself. Please note that both publishDir and publish_dir are supported but at least one has to be configured.

publish_dir.description: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory
publish_dir.help_text: Type: `string`, required, example: `output/`. Path to an output directory.
